main event: A UFO sighting involving a bright yellowish white object reported by a civilian in Ridgefield, Washington on August 5, 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared as a little round ball of fire, slightly larger than a bright star., The object had a yellowish white color., It was reported to have a straight flight path., The sighting was recorded using ground-radar for a duration of 5 seconds., There was no physical evidence found related to the sighting.
witness description: a civilian, Mrs., age 35, who reported the sighting
